title: Introducing: Spirit House
content:
Hailing from New Mexico, Spirit House write blisteringly perfect indie pop tracks, with their two debut outings showcasing very differing aspects to the group.

Take Smile; at only two minutes in length, it conveys a ludicrous amount, part MGMT, part Two Door Cinema Club, there’s no cheap tricks or gimmicks, just stellar songwriting. On the flip side, Winter Adventure Land is a drone inspired instrumental affair, proving the ideal comedown from the sugar rush of it’s predecessor. Check out both tracks below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
